text:
@CathiBrennan67 It’s called”NOVEL Coronavirus”because it’s NEW not because someone wrote a long story about it.

Humans have NO immunity.

NO VACCINES! Millions of people get flu vaccines every year. Medicare pays for”elderly”to get flu vaccines.

Causes severe respiratory problems;damages lungs
